channel.title: Rts on Games Fiction
channel.description: Recent content in Rts on Games Fiction

item.title: How Foxhole redefines the MMO genre
item.description: When we think about MMOs, the first thought on our minds are MMORPGS like World of Warcraft, Final Fantasy XIV, Guild Wars. all these games are massive multiplayer online games, with hundreds of players connected, adventuring on quests, items, leveling up, all that kind of stuff
